displayName.japanese: ゲームはいま始まるところだ

description.english: Finish the Arcade mode in Easy difficulty
description.french: Finir le mode Arcade en Facile

description.english: Finish the Arcade mode in Normal difficulty

description.schinese: 在普通难度模式中完成街机模式

description.english: Finish the Arcade mode in Hard difficulty
description.french: Finir le mode Arcade en Difficile
description.german: Schließe den Arcade-Modus auf "Schwer" ab.
description.italian: Finire il modo Arcade in difficoltà Difficile
description.japanese: 難易度ハードでアーケードモードを終わらせる

description.schinese: 在困难难度模式中完成街机模式
description.spanish: Acaba el modo Arcade en Difícil.

description.english: Finish Alaska in Normal or Hard difficulty without being hit!
description.french: Finir l'Alaska en mode Normal ou Difficile sans se faire toucher !
description.german: Schließe Alaska auf "Normal" oder "Schwer" ab, ohne getroffen zu werden!
description.italian: Finire l'Alaska in difficoltà Normale o Difficile senza farsi colpire!
description.japanese: 難易度ノーマルまたはハードで攻撃を受けずにアラスカを終わらせる！
description.koreana: 공격을 당하지 않고 보통 또는 어려움 난이도로 알래스카를 끝내세요!
description.brazilian: Complete 'Alasca' no nível Normal ou Difícil sem ser atingido!
description.russian: Пройдите «Аляску» на среднем или трудном уровне сложности, ни разу не получив повреждений.
description.schinese: 在普通或困难难度模式中完成阿拉斯加关卡，且未被击中！
description.spanish: ¡Completa Alaska en dificultad Normal o Difícil sin recibir daños!

description.english: Finish Industrial Complex in Normal or Hard difficulty without being hit!

description.italian: Finire il Complesso Industriale in difficoltà Normale o Difficile senza farsi colpire!
description.japanese: 難易度ノーマルまたはハードで攻撃を受けずに鋳造所を終わらせる！
description.koreana: 공격을 당하지 않고 보통 또는 어려움 난이도로 산업 단지를 끝내세요!
description.brazilian: Complete 'Complexo Industrial' no nível Normal ou Difícil sem ser atingido!
description.russian: Пройдите «Промышленный комплекс» на среднем или трудном уровне сложности, ни разу не получив повреждений.
description.schinese: 在普通或困难难度模式中完成工业园关卡，且未被击中！
description.spanish: ¡Completa Complejo industrial en dificultad Normal o Difícil sin recibir daños!

description.english: Finish Xibalba in Normal or Hard difficulty without being hit!

description.schinese: 在一个关卡中使用超级进攻 5 次

description.english: Survive 3 minutes in front of the Xibalba Keylock
description.french: Survivre 3 minutes devant le cadenas de Xibalba
description.german: Überlebe 3 Minuten lang vor dem Schlüsselschalter von Xibalba.
description.italian: Sopravvivi 3 minuti di fronte alla serratura di Xibalba
description.japanese: シバルバキーロックの前で3分耐える
description.brazilian: Sobreviva 3 minutos em frente à entrada de Xibalbá
description.russian: Продержитесь 3 минут в столкновении с Замком Шибальбы.
description.schinese: 在地狱神殿死锁前生存 3 分钟
description.spanish: Sobrevive durante 3 minutos frente al candado de Xibalba.

description.english: Destroy all three boss parts being built in the Industrial Complex
description.french: Détruire les 3 parties en construction du boss du Complexe Industriel
description.german: Zerstöre alle drei Boss-Teile, die im Industriekomplex gebaut werden.
description.italian: Distruggi le 3 parti del Boss costruite nel Complesso Industriale
description.japanese: 鋳造所で作られているボスパーツを3つ全部壊す
description.koreana: 산업 단지에서 제작 중인 보스 부품 3개를 모두 파괴하세요
description.brazilian: Destrua as três partes de chefes sendo construídas no Complexo Industrial
description.russian: Уничтожьте все три части босса, которые собирают в промышленном комплексе.
description.schinese: 破坏工业园内在建的三个老怪零件
description.spanish: Destruye las tres partes del jefe que están construyendo en el Complejo Industrial.

description.english: Destroy all the hidden enemies of Alaska
description.french: Détruire tous les ennemis cachés dans l'Alaska
description.german: Zerstöre alle verborgenen Gegner in Alaska.
description.italian: Distruggi tutti i nemici nascosti in Alaska
description.japanese: アラスカの隠れた敵全員を倒す
description.brazilian: Elimine todos os inimigos escondidos do Alasca
description.russian: Уничтожьте всех спрятанных врагов на Аляске.
description.schinese: 消灭阿拉斯加境内的所有隐藏敌人
description.spanish: Destruye a todos los enemigos escondidos en Alaska.

description.english: Leave at least one Jaguar Doom Sphere alive while defeating the Dune Ocean boss
description.german: Lasse mindestens eine Jaguar-Kugelsphäre am Leben und besiege den Dünenmeer-Boss im Kampf.
description.french: Laisser une Sphère de l'Enfer Jaguar en vie pendant tout le combat du boss de l'Océan de dunes
description.italian: Lascia almeno una Sfera Jaguar Doom viva sconfiggendo il boss dell'Oceano delle Dune
description.koreana: 듄 오션 보스 전투에서 이기면서 적어도 한 개의 재규어 둠 스피어를 살아남도록 하세요
description.spanish: Derrota al jefe de Océano de dunas dejando al menos una esfera letal de Jaguar intacta.
description.schinese: 击败沙丘海老怪的同时，至少还有一个猎豹毁灭球活着
description.russian: Не уничтожайте хотя бы одну Сферу рока «Ягуара» во время битвы с боссом Моря дюн.
description.japanese: 砂漠の海のボス戦をやっつけているあいだにジャガードゥームスフィアを最低1つ残しておく
description.brazilian: Deixe pelo menos uma Esfera da Perdição do Jaguar ativa enquanto derrota o chefe do Oceano de Dunas em um combate

description.russian: Побейте рекорд разработчиков в легком режиме.

description.english: Destroy a boss while you're already dead
description.german: Zerstöre einen Boss, wenn du schon tot bist.
description.french: Détruire un boss alors que tu es déjà mort
description.italian: Distruggi un boss quando sei già morto
description.spanish: Destruye a un jefe cuando ya estés muerto.
description.schinese: 虽然你先死，但最终还是干掉了老怪
description.russian: Уничтожьте босса после своей смерти.
description.japanese: 自分が死んでる最中にボスを倒す
description.brazilian: Elimine um chefe quando você já estiver morto

description.english: Reach the Alaska boss without firing a single shot
description.french: Atteindre le boss de l'Alaska sans tirer une seule fois
description.german: Erreiche den Alaska-Boss, ohne einen Schuss abzufeuern.
description.italian: Raggiungi il Boss in Alaska senza sparare un singolo colpo
description.japanese: 一発も撃たずにアラスカのボスまでたどり着く
description.koreana: 한 발도 발사하지 않고 알래스카 보스에 도달하세요
description.brazilian: Alcance o chefe do Alasca sem disparar um único tiro
description.russian: Доберитесь до босса Аляски, не сделав ни единого выстрела.
description.schinese: 到达阿拉斯加老怪，且未射一枪
description.spanish: Llega hasta el jefe de Alaska sin disparar ni una vez.

description.english: Destroy all the enemy fuel cells in K-7Z4-C0A7L
description.french: Détruire toutes les cellules d'énergie dans K-7Z4-C0A7L

description.koreana: K-7Z4-C0A7L에서 적 연료 전지를 모두 파괴하세요

description.russian: Уничтожьте все вражеские топливные ячейки в K-7Z4-C0A7L.

description.spanish: Destruye todos los depósitos de combustible de K-7Z4-C0A7L.
